description:
Use Case Description
---------------------
CLI-151 addresses a bug fix between version 1.1 and 1.2.
'testRenderWrappedTextMultiLinePadded' is found in the HelpFormatterTest in V1.3. 
This test case is added to V1.1 and V1.2 after making a modification to address the issue with truncation.
This test case passes in V1.2 but fails in V1.1
